name: The Hanged Man
summary:
シリーズ本編としての最終作The Hanged Man

A boy walks through the snow, wandering around town.
After running from place to place, he ends up in an old, abandoned building in the woods.
Though he hoped to leave soon, when his best friend runs away, he must face his trial and go in search of him...
info:
